Comment.val:
This sample requires building a custom client as follows:
For Android: -------------------- 1. Copy the files from the SampleProjects\Rich Internet Samples\Android\ImageResize-src folder to the RIAModules\Android\Source\app\src\main\java\com\magicsoftware\magicdev folder. 2. Build the customized Android client by running the build.bat file (under RIAModules\Android\Source).
For iOS: -------------------- 1. Copy the files from the SampleProjects\Rich Internet Samples\iOS\ImageResize-MagicApp folder to the RIAModules\iOS\Source\MagicApp folder. 2. Copy the files from the RIAModules\iOS\Source folder to the Mac machine. 3. Open the project (MagicApp.xcodeproj) using Xcode and from the File menu, select Add Files to “MagicApp”. From the opened dialog box, navigate to the MagicApp folder, select the ImageResize.h and ImageResize.m files and click Add. 4. Build the customized iOS client by running the build.sh file (under RIAModules\iOS\Source).
That's it.
